name: Atlantis (Hermann Kuntsch)
overview: In the beginning of time, Gods arose and created an island in the middle of a great ocean. In the centre of this island they constructed a large black tower from where they could rule. The Gods were fair and ruled the four kingdoms with justice and kindness for until they disappeared. After five years, the life in Atlantis was a disaster, as the land was rife with plague and disease as well as gangs of robbers plundering everywhere. The kings of the four kingdoms set off to wander the four kingdoms in search of the keys to enter the tower and solve this mystery. Atlantis is a German tactical RPG in a classic fantasy setting.
